text: Hemipilia cruciata is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is found in China and Taiwan. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Hemipilia cruciata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Hemipilia cruciata
